scripts.cp:themes: cross-env cp node_modules/@beyond-framework/common-uitoolkit-beyond/dist/css/beyond-theme-base.css public/theme-base.css && cp node_modules/@beyond-framework/common-uitoolkit-beyond/dist/css/beyond-theme-dark.css public/theme-dark.css && cp node_modules/@beyond-framework/common-uitoolkit-beyond/dist/css/beyond-theme-ai7.css public/theme-ai7.css  && cp node_modules/@beyond-framework/common-uitoolkit-beyond/dist/beyond_logo.png public/beyond_logo.png
scripts.startNoKeycloak: cross-env keycloakEnabled=false authorizationEnabled=false PORT=3000 npm start
scripts.startHttpServer: envsub --env authorization_enabled=false --env keycloak_enabled=false ./configuration.json ./build/configuration && cross-env PORT=3000 serve -n build/
scripts.build.prod: npm run cp:themes && cross-env INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false craco build
scripts.build.instrument: npm run cp:themes && cross-env BUILD_PATH='./build-instrument' CYPRESS_INSTRUMENT_PRODUCTION=true INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false craco -r @cypress/instrument-cra build
scripts.test: echo 'Remove echo to start testing ->' start-server-and-test startNoKeycloak 3000 cypress:run
scripts.ci:run:instrument: npm run ci:prepare && cross-env keycloakEnabled=false authorizationEnabled=false BROWSER=none craco -r @cypress/instrument-cra start
scripts.ci:test: echo 'Remove echo to start testing ->' npm run ci:test:cypress
